About AIContentCreator.org

We are a global clearinghouse of resources on AIâ€™s impact on art and culture

Our Mission:

Recent advances in Artificial Intelligence, in particular machine learning, have brought into being numerous ground-breaking advances in different areas ranging from medicine to art. Its superhuman performance has blown our mind as to what machines are capable of achieving not only in inference and decision-making but also in creativity and innovation in general. We hope that this masterpiece of science and engineering could benefit the public, in particular artists and graphics designers, by bringing them inspirations to their day-to-day work. Through this, we hope to enhance human cognitive capabilities with the help of machines.
